--- select_singer_with_toplevel_join_hint.sql
@{FORCE_JOIN_ORDER=TRUE}
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers A
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  Singers B
  ON A.SingerID = B.SingerID

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: &parser.Hint{
    pos:     0,
    end:     24,
    Records: []*parser.HintRecord{
      &parser.HintRecord{
        Key: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  2,
          end:  18,
          Name: "FORCE_JOIN_ORDER",
        },
        Value: &parser.BoolLiteral{
          pos:   19,
          Value: true,
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      25,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 34,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:    36,
      Source: &parser.Join{
        Op:     "LEFT OUTER JOIn",
        Method: "",
        Hint:   (*parser.Hint)(nil),
        Left:   &parser.TableName{
          Table: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  43,
            end:  50,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &parser.AsAlias{
            pos:   51,
            Alias: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  51,
              end:  52,
              Name: "A",
            },
          },
          Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        Right: &parser.TableName{
          Table: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  73,
            end:  80,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &parser.AsAlias{
            pos:   81,
            Alias: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  81,
              end:  82,
              Name: "B",
            },
          },
          Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        Cond: &parser.On{
          pos:  85,
          Expr: &parser.BinaryExpr{
            Op:   "=",
            Left: &parser.Path{
              Idents: []*parser.Ident{
                &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  88,
                  end:  89,
                  Name: "A",
                },
                &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  90,
                  end:  98,
                  Name: "SingerID",
                },
              },
            },
            Right: &parser.Path{
              Idents: []*parser.Ident{
                &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  101,
                  end:  102,
                  Name: "B",
                },
                &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  103,
                  end:  111,
                  Name: "SingerID",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
@{FORCE_JOIN_ORDER=TRUE} SELECT * FROM Singers AS A LEFT OUTER JOIn Singers AS B ON A.SingerID = B.SingerID
